entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as one of the people with Hagrid and Neville. He sneaked up behind Neville and grabbed him for a joke.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as one of the people with Hagrid and Malfoy. He panicked and sent up sparks when Malfoy grabbed him.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as being fuming and in charge of the group. He is trying to catch something in the forest.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is mentioned as an animal that Harry goes with into the forest.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the people who will be staying with Hagrid and Neville.

relationships.description: Malfoy grabbed Neville for a joke.
Harry is going with Fang into the forest.
Hagrid will be staying with Hermione and Neville.
